text: Mara Sacchi (born 3 November 1948) is a retired Italian freestyle swimmer. She competed at the 1964 Olympics in the 100 m and 4 × 100 m freestyle relay and reached the final in the relay. Sacchi's brother Massimo and nephew Luca are also Olympic swimmers.Perrone, Roberto (28 July 1992) bronzo a Sacchi, carbone al calcio. title: Mara Sacchi
